text:
Error installing on Windows Vista 

Installer failed to write httpd.conf file ..error in command line "Access Denied"
there is no httpd.conf file in the Apache directory !!!

peace John
creator: xibit@otenet.gr

text:
When trying to start ,restart, stop, server  

a command window displays 

the systen cannot find the file specified : No Installed service named "Apache2" 

The httpd.conf file ...in Windows Vista is named "httpd-win.conf"
creator: xibit@otenet.gr

text:
To install Apache 2.2 on Windows Vista 

okay after after installing & uninstalling Apache 10 times 

Vista User Account's must be "turned off" , before trying to install
or else Apache 2.2 ..will not install !!!

peace John
creator: xibit@otenet.gr
